steps.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Linea baking sheet with parchment.Scoop 3 tablespoons mixture(using an ice cream scoop)and pat into a 3-inch roundon baking sheet.
Bake, rotatingtray, until clusters aregolden brown, 15 to 18 minutes.
Let cool completely.Store in an airtight containerfor up to 1 week.
